addicted.translation[0].definitions[0].d: unable to stop taking a harmful substance, especially a drug
addicted.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Fifty million Americans are addicted to nicotine.
addicted.translation[0].definitions[1].d: liking something so much that you do not want to stop doing it or having it
addicted.translation[0].definitions[1].e: kids addicted to surfing the Net
